example.description: This command fetches details of all public Amazon Machine Images (AMIs) in the 'us-west-1' region.

This command fetches details of the Amazon Machine Images (AMIs) in the current region for the currently configured user and default region. To change the user account, use the -StoredCredentials or -AccessKey/-SecretKey parameters to supply alternate credentials.
This command uses a filter to return only the Amazon Machine Images (AMIs) that run Microsoft Windows for the current default region.
